summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Batman: The Complete Television Series (Limited Edition) [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2014/07/26 Store: Various (Actor, Director) Rated: NR Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure Product Description: ["TV's iconic Dynamic Duo has been captured, along with a legion of abominable archenemies in a POW-erful numbered limited-edition collection. Featuring ALL 120 original broadcast episodes, ever popular guest stars like Julie Newmar", 'and Cesar Romero, The Adam West Scrapbook, complete episode guide — and exploding with over 3 hours of all new extras — you can bring home all the crime fighting action that won generations of fans!', 'Includes:', '·', 'ALL 120 Original Broadcast Episodes Fully Remastered In HD', '·', 'Highly Collectible Premiums', 'Hot Wheels® Replica Batmobile', 'The Adam West Scrapbook', '44 Vintage Trading Cards', 'Ultraviolet Digital Copy', '32-Page Complete Episode Guide', '·', 'OVER 3 Hours Of ALL NEW Extras:', 'o', 'Hanging with Batman', '– A true slice of life in the words of Adam West', 'o', 'Holy Memorabilia Batman!', '– A journey into the most sought after collectables through the eyes of 3 extraordinary collectors', 'o', 'Batmania Born!', '- Building the World of Batman – Explore the art and design behind the fiction.', 'o', 'Bats of the Round Table', '– A candid conversation with Adam West and his celebrity friends, chatting all things Bat ’66.', 'o', 'Inventing Batman in the words of Adam West', '(episode 1 &2) - A rare treat for the fans as Adam discusses his script notes on bringing Batman to life in the first and second episodes', 'o', 'Na Na Na Batman!', '— Hollywood favorites stars and producers recount their favorite Batman memories'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Television, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Blu-ray, Limited Edition, Box set, Full Screen, Digital_copy', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '13', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 0.7 x 5.4 inches; 2.17 Pounds', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, Limited Edition, Box set, Full Screen, Digital_copy', 'Run time': '50 hours and 19 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 11, 2014', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Subtitles': 'French, Latin Spanish', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Number of discs': '13'} Review Text: Retail price $269.79 but you can get it for at least 30% off $189.99 and people are whining about it? Look at what you are getting: 120 episodes plus interviews and other extras. This entire thing would never happened anyway because of the stalemate between WB & FOX, but now it is here, available for you to own forever in crystal clarity pictures and sounds. It is as if it was just filmed yesterday. If you're whining about the price then begone with you. You're not a true fan. You're a whiner.

I will post a follow up to this post once I have had the opportunity to watch a few episodes and all of the extras so that the people who didn't get it can comprehend how awesome this set is. Review Title: Price whiner, begone! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Shock Waves [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2014/11/29 Store: Peter Cushing (Actor), Brooke Adams (Actor), Ken Wiederhorn (Director) & 0 more Rated: NR Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Horror', 'Format': 'Blu-ray, NTSC, Widescreen, Color, Mono', 'Contributor': 'John Carradine, Jack Davidson, Fred Buch, Brooke Adams, Peter Cushing, Ken Wiederhorn, Luke Halpin, Reuben TraneJohn Carradine, Jack Davidson, Fred Buch, Brooke Adams, Peter Cushing, Ken Wiederhorn, Luke Halpin, Reuben Trane See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 25 minutes'} Review Text: I swear, this movie was made to get you to hope that the Nazi zombies win and kill all of the characters. Good movie but the main characters who aren't zombies are very much the dumb blondes that you hope would get killed which did happened and you're very glad that they got killed for being stupid. Review Title: Good movie but... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/01/15 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '한국어', '日本語', 'العربية', 'Português', 'Nederlands', 'Deutsch', 'Русский', 'हिन्दी', 'Español (España)', 'Indonesia', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Türkçe', '中文（台灣）', '中文（中国）', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Deutsch', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Français', 'हिन्दी', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português', 'Русский', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Joe Nussbaum'], 'Producers': ['Pixie Wespiser'], 'Starring': ['Olivia Sanabia', 'Abby Donnelly', 'Aubrey Miller'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: WOW, this is very good-something a whole family can enjoy watching together. The writing, directing and acting are very very well done. Amazon, please make this into a series with at least 2 seasons of 10-13 episodes. I will be looking forward to seeing more episodes. Review Title: WOW! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/02/05 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Čeština', 'Magyar', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['David Semel', 'Daniel Percival', 'Ken Olin', 'Michael Rymer', 'Bryan Spicer', 'Nelson Mccormick', 'Brad Anderson', 'Karyn Kusama', 'Michael Slovis'], 'Producers': ['Ridley Scott', 'David W. Zucker', 'Frank Spotnitz', 'Isa Dick Hackett', 'Christopher Tricarico', 'Stewart Mackinnon', 'Chrtistian Baute', 'Jace Richdale', 'Richard Heus', 'Dan Percival', 'Jordan Sheehan', 'Kalen Egan', 'Erin Smith'], 'Starring': ['Alexa Davalos', 'Rupert Evans', 'Luke Kleintank']} Review Text: Wow! Incredible first episode. Very interesting premise. The acting, directing and production value are amazing. Please make more episodes. Review Title: I want more! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/02/16 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['George Roy Hill'], 'Producers': ['Yves Rousset-Rouard', 'Robert L. Crawford'], 'Starring': ['Laurence Olivier', 'Arthur Hill', 'Sally Kellerman'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']} Review Text: Such a beautiful movie made during the time when characters mattered. Don't think Laurence Olivier is anything less here than his younger self. He did not disappoints in this role. They don't make movies like this anymore which is such a shame. They filmed this on location rather than CGI in the background like the movies these days. Review Title: Beautiful movie for all ages Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a strong preference for high-quality, engaging media, particularly in the movie and TV categories, with a notable focus on Blu-ray formats. The individual consistently rates products highly, often with average ratings above 4.5, indicating a strong sentiment towards well-produced content featuring notable actors and directors. A recurring theme is a penchant for nostalgic, classic titles, with an appreciation for intricate storytelling and character development.

Price sensitivity is evident, yet the individual expresses willingness to invest in premium, limited edition collections, valuing extensive extras and collectibles. They exhibit a low tolerance for negative feedback on pricing from other consumers, suggesting a strong loyalty to products reflective of deep fan engagement.

Additionally, there is an inclination towards action, adventure, and horror genres, as well as content suitable for family viewing, highlighting versatility in preferences. The reviewer shows an enthusiasm for the quality of production—commenting on clear audio and visuals—while favoring entertainment that sparks emotional responses, from nostalgia to thrill.

Overall, core preferences indicate a discerning consumer who values quality storytelling and visual presentation over price, cherishing both classic collections and new releases that deliver strong narratives and artistic merit.

target_interaction.title: WOW! Very entertaining
target_interaction.text: WOW! Very entertaining. Love the story in the pilot. The acting was great from all involved. Can't find a single thing bad about this pilot. Please make a series of this. I'd love to watch more Skyward episodes than just the pilot.
